name: Distribuidora Internacional de Alimentación SA
bossPosition: Director Asesoría Jurídica. Vicesecretario Consejo de Administración
goal: DIA (Distribuidora Internacional de Alimentación) is an international food retailer that also distributes fast-moving and HPC goods. DIA is Spain’s largest franchisor and the number three franchise player in the European food sector. DIA is traded on the Madrid Stock Exchange and is part of the Ibex 35, the main reference index of the Spanish stock market.
interests: Agriculture, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
B2B (unfair trading practices), E-commerce, Internal market, Enviroment, Food Safety, Payments, Agriculture
Competition, Energy
